thread.title: Ground News - Former pastor of Ontario megachurch faces 2 more sexual assault charges, police say
thread.title_full: Ground News - Former pastor of Ontario megachurch faces 2 more sexual assault charges, police say

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Former pastor of Ontario megachurch faces 2 more sexual assault charges, police say
text:
Summary by Ground News Bruxy Cavey was charged with two counts of sexual assault on Dec. 22. The former pastor of The Meeting House in Oakville, Ont., will appear in court in January. A church investigation found Cavey had a sexual relationship with a woman that contravened church policies. A victim's advocate for the church's patrons previously said there were 38 allegations.
